header_font=”|700|||||||” header_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_font_size=”60px” sticky_enabled=”0″]

SAFETY

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#ffffff” text_font_size=”27px” text_letter_spacing=”2px” text_line_height=”1.2em” text_orientation=”center” width=”100%” module_alignment=”left” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding=”||||false|false” text_font_size_tablet=”18px” text_font_size_phone=”16px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

At the end of the day, the goals are simple: safety and security.” – JodiRell

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ custom_padding=”0px||0px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ width=”95%” max_width=”95%” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”64px||57px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ background_enable_color=”off” border_width_right=”1px” border_color_right=”#ffffff” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.gmciltd.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/Safety-@-GMCI-1.jpg” title_text=”Safety @ GMCI (1)” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.4.7″ global_colors_info=”{}” filter_brightness__hover_enabled=”on|hover” filter_brightness__hover=”94%”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato||on||||||” text_text_color=”#004A4F” text_font_size=”37px” text_letter_spacing=”0.5px” text_line_height=”1.4em” text_orientation=”center” width=”100%” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”||||false|false” custom_padding=”25px||||false|false” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”16px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

“Our workforce is our pride and we clinch uncompromising safety for them.”

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ border_width_right=”1px” border_color_right=”#ffffff” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_font_size=”19px” text_letter_spacing=”0.5px” text_line_height=”1.8em” custom_margin=”||2px|||” custom_padding=”||26px|||” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”20px||||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|67|67|100|4|0|-4″ text_text_color_tablet=”” text_text_color_phone=”” text_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_orientation_tablet=”center” text_orientation_phone=”center” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

As an organization, we aim to reduce the environmental impact of our activities and reduce the likelihood of a severe accident occurring at the site so that the likelihood is small. To do this, we use a comprehensive framework to address all hazards and environmental impacts linked with our operations. We aim resources to minimize the risk associated with our most substantial hazards and environmental impacts and involve top management in setting targets and targets for achieving these reductions. GMCI is dedicated to the health and protection of our staff, vendors and communities. As part of this dedication, we are working to ensure safe and secure operation of our services. We also ensure that we are prepared in the case of an emergency at our facilities or in the surrounding region.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato||||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_font_size=”20px” text_letter_spacing=”0.5px” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_6_font=”Lato|700|on||||||” header_6_text_align=”left” header_6_text_color=”#004b4f” header_6_font_size=”18px” header_6_letter_spacing=”0.5px” header_6_line_height=”1.5em” custom_margin=”-4px||1px|||” custom_padding=”10px||||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”|||20px|false|false” custom_padding_phone=”20px|||20px|false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|67|67|100|4|0|-4″ text_text_color_tablet=”” text_text_color_phone=”” text_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” header_6_font_size_tablet=”24px” header_6_font_size_phone=”24px” header_6_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” text_orientation_tablet=”left” text_orientation_phone=”left” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

CONTINUOUS MONITORING

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_font_size=”19px” text_letter_spacing=”0.5px” text_line_height=”1.8em” custom_margin=”||2px|||” custom_padding=”||26px|||” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”20px||||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|67|67|100|4|0|-4″ text_text_color_tablet=”” text_text_color_phone=”” text_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_orientation_tablet=”center” text_orientation_phone=”center” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Our manufacturing process is constantly monitored to ensure that our raw materials and goods are pre-registered or licensed in accordance with the guidelines. Also, the machines are monitored regularly in case any defect is there could be taken care of.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato||||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_font_size=”20px” text_letter_spacing=”0.5px” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_6_font=”Lato|700|on||||||” header_6_text_align=”left” header_6_text_color=”#004b4f” header_6_font_size=”18px” header_6_letter_spacing=”0.5px” header_6_line_height=”1.5em” custom_margin=”-4px||1px|||” custom_padding=”10px||||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”|||20px|false|false” custom_padding_phone=”20px|||20px|false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|67|67|100|4|0|-4″ text_text_color_tablet=”” text_text_color_phone=”” text_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” header_6_font_size_tablet=”24px” header_6_font_size_phone=”24px” header_6_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” text_orientation_tablet=”left” text_orientation_phone=”left” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

ZERO TOLERANCE

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_font_size=”19px” text_letter_spacing=”0.5px” text_line_height=”1.8em” custom_margin=”||2px|||” custom_padding=”||26px|||” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”20px||||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|67|67|100|4|0|-4″ text_text_color_tablet=”” text_text_color_phone=”” text_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_orientation_tablet=”center” text_orientation_phone=”center” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

GMCI follows a zero-tolerance approach. Even the smallest of procedures may cause the greatest number of incidents. The industry, by its design, can be dangerous and, in order to ensure compliance with safety regulations, a zero-tolerance policy is a must. Safety measures in the process of mineral are mostly about prevention. Even if the deviation does not cause accidents, it is important for us to make the employee concerned, understand the generosity of the consequences.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato||||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_font_size=”20px” text_letter_spacing=”0.5px” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_6_font=”Lato|700|on||||||” header_6_text_align=”left” header_6_text_color=”#004b4f” header_6_font_size=”18px” header_6_letter_spacing=”0.5px” header_6_line_height=”1.5em” custom_margin=”-4px||1px|||” custom_padding=”10px||||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”|||20px|false|false” custom_padding_phone=”20px|||20px|false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|67|67|100|4|0|-4″ text_text_color_tablet=”” text_text_color_phone=”” text_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” header_6_font_size_tablet=”24px” header_6_font_size_phone=”24px” header_6_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” text_orientation_tablet=”left” text_orientation_phone=”left” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

LABELLING ON HAZARDOUS MATERIALS AND EQUIPMENT

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_font_size=”19px” text_letter_spacing=”0.5px” text_line_height=”1.8em” custom_margin=”||2px|||” custom_padding=”||26px|||” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”20px||||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|67|67|100|4|0|-4″ text_text_color_tablet=”” text_text_color_phone=”” text_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_orientation_tablet=”center” text_orientation_phone=”center” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

The importance of labels in the mineral industry is of utmost importance. The labelling on the containers will govern the behavior of your employees towards them. GMCI has properly labeled the package according to its mineral properties such as machinery, thermal stress, UV exposure,whole body vibration etc. otherwise improper labels may result in fatal accidents in the manufacture of chemicals.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato||||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_font_size=”20px” text_letter_spacing=”0.5px” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_6_font=”Lato|700|on||||||” header_6_text_align=”left” header_6_text_color=”#004b4f” header_6_font_size=”18px” header_6_letter_spacing=”0.5px” header_6_line_height=”1.5em” custom_margin=”-4px||1px|||” custom_padding=”10px||||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”|||20px|false|false” custom_padding_phone=”20px|||20px|false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|67|67|100|4|0|-4″ text_text_color_tablet=”” text_text_color_phone=”” text_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” header_6_font_size_tablet=”24px” header_6_font_size_phone=”24px” header_6_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” text_orientation_tablet=”left” text_orientation_phone=”left” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

PPE KITS

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_font_size=”19px” text_letter_spacing=”0.5px” text_line_height=”1.8em” custom_margin=”||2px|||” custom_padding=”||26px|||” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”20px||||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|67|67|100|4|0|-4″ text_text_color_tablet=”” text_text_color_phone=”” text_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_orientation_tablet=”center” text_orientation_phone=”center” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Personal Protective Equipment Kits are essential for all the employees of GMCI, working in the factory. The kit is provided after assessing the hazards at the workplace. Routine inspection is also done to ensure that each and every employee is wearing and using the kit properly.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ background_image=”https://www.gmciltd.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/sky-blue-texture-1-scaled.jpg” custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row custom_padding_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”4.4.7″ background_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.56)” width=”100%” max_width=”100%” custom_padding=”131px||131px||true|false” custom_padding_tablet=”100px||100px||true|false” custom_padding_phone=”130px||130px||true|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Poppins|600|||||||” text_text_color=”#ffffff” text_font_size=”58px” text_line_height=”1.4em” width=”93%” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”||||false|true” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|67|67|100|4|0|-4″ text_text_color_tablet=”” text_text_color_phone=”” text_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”38px” text_font_size_phone=”27px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Get more information

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”https://www.gmciltd.com/contact-us/” button_text=”CONTACT US” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.4.7″ custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”13px” button_text_color=”#04484E” button_bg_color=”#ffffff” button_border_width=”0px” button_border_color=”#ffffff” button_border_radius=”1px” button_font=”|600||on|||||” button_use_icon=”off” custom_margin=”23px|||30px|false|false” custom_padding=”13px|32px|13px|32px|true|true” global_colors_info=”{}” button_bg_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” button_bg_color__hover=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” button_bg_enable_color__hover=”on” button_text_color__hover_enabled=”on|desktop” button_text_color__hover=”#ffffff” button_border_width__hover_enabled=”on|hover” button_border_width__hover=”1px” button_border_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” button_border_color__hover=”#ffffff”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
